creator: cristian.adam@iquestint.com
text:
The SourceOffSite soslabel task doesn't have the soshome attribute like sosget,
soscheckin and soscheckout tasks. And without this attribute the tasks fails.
actually it just doesn't have it listed in the documentation
creator: vadimk@quadrus.com
vadimk@quadrus.com
text:
The following attributes are not listed:
version, nocache, nocompress, soshome, localpath

creator: timcrook@comcast.net
text:
Comments from Vadim Kazakov are not entirely true.  While it's true that they 
are not listed in the documentation - even if you include the soshome 
attribute, the task fails.
